variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a change of glutamine to histidine at position 273, potentially altering the protein's function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HeLa cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_000546.5:c.817G>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type P53 protein was used as a positive control.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: One benign control was used, but no specific details were provided.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 75% relative to wild-type P53.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 60% relative to wild-type P53.
